name: Global uniques
uniques: [+1 Culture] from each Trade Route <with [Arepa]> <after discovering [Writing]>
unitUniques: [Target Unit] gains the [Deflect Active] status for [1] turn(s) <upon damaging a [{non-[Deflect CD]} {Deflect}] unit> <for [Ranged] units> <for [non-[Air]] units>
[Target Unit] gains the [Deflect Cooldown] status for [5] turn(s) <upon damaging a [{non-[Deflect CD]} {Deflect}] unit> <for [Ranged] units> <for [non-[Air]] units>
